message.content: {"given_definition_quality":33,"better_definition":"a large store or building with many shops","sentence":"他们在商场。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animation style image showing several people (adults and children) walking inside a large modern mall with multiple stores visible, some with bright window displays. The mall has escalators and a glass ceiling. The setting is peaceful and slightly dreamy, with warm lighting and gentle shadows, evoking a sense of calm and subtle surrealism in a post-apocalyptic world (intact, not ruined, but with a mysterious, quiet atmosphere). No visible text.","sentence_translation":"They are at the mall."}
